title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Design of tractor chassis. Tractor stability analysis. Single and three point hitch systems. Drawbar performance. Quick attaching couplers. Hydraulic controls and systems. Design of mechanical and power steering. Human factors engineering in tractor design.
